name: PSE PornoScraperExecutor (Pornhub)
author: Wilson Moises Diaz

sections.description:
The best WordPress plugin for XXX / porn content? Supports close to everything you can imagine, still keeping it easy & simple.

It is very likely the one and only plugin you will ever need to handle sex content on your WordPress site(s). It goes far beyond just making your videos responsive!

Do not pay more for tools that do not meet your expectations. This product will be your ideal solution. It is perfect.

Make sure to check out the official page for examples of the plugin and everything about it.

Soon we will include other video providers besides Pornhub

  • Official Page

Features

  • Ready to use. Just install, activate the plugin and you will be ready to create content through pornoscraper.com
  • SEO friendly, allows you to specify the title, description, tags and categories. With this you will have better indexing.
  • Responsive embeds with CSS, much better then with JavaScript.

Supported Providers

  • Pornhub

Supported 3rd party video services

  • Openload. All processed videos are uploaded to openload.co cloud. Only valid Openload.co video embeds are allowed by this plugin. Openload Official Page

Reviews

If you find this plugin useful please give it a 5 star review.

Thanks

  • Of course all users of this plugin.
  • Chris Hernández of [porns.cat] (https://porns.cat) for bringing up the idea of how this project should be.

Thanks to the developers of the software used in PSE

  • ARVE, Part of the ARVE code was used in this plugin.
sections.changelog:
=1.0.2=
* Fixed bug over PHP 5.3

1.0.1

  • Bug correction: now PSE alerts if permalinks are disabled

1.0

  • First stable version.
